sentences.en: A new process of Hydration of propylene oxide to glycols was introduced.
sentences.cn: 采用反应精馏新工艺由环氧丙烷水合制丙二醇.

sentences.en: Addition Reactions to Alkynes, Hydrogenation , Halogenation and HX. Hydration of alkynes. Tautomerization.
sentences.cn: 炔烃的加成, 氢化,卤化和HX. 炔烃的水化作用,互变异构化.

sentences.en: After completed hydration of protoplast, outermost part of intine shed off , too.
sentences.cn: 最后,花粉内壁和细胞质因为水分渗透压的关系,彼此分离.

sentences.en: Eight full hours after application, its still increasing skins hydration by 25 %.
sentences.cn: 使用8小时后仍然能继续给肌肤提供水分滋润,皮肤的滋润度保持在曾加25%的水平.

sentences.en: How does hydration assist patients with sickle cell disease?
sentences.cn: 水合作用(液体治疗)用于镰状细胞病治疗的原因?

sentences.en: If water is the solvent, it is called hydration.
sentences.cn: 如果以水作溶剂, 它便称为水合.

sentences.en: Like hydration, the final effects of fluid and salt depletion depend on the volume of fluid.
sentences.cn: 象水合作用一样, 水和盐分耗竭的最终效应,也是根据液体的容积而定的.

sentences.en: No water of hydration is present in most Fiberfrax paper grades.
sentences.cn: 大多数等级的Fiberfrax纸都不含水合水.

sentences.en: Now, it turns out, too much hydration can kill you.
sentences.cn: 但结果表明过多的水合作用也会要了你的命.

sentences.en: Previous experiments and simulations, however, indicated that the free energy of hydration did not match this predicted linear trend.
sentences.cn: 然而，过去的研究和模拟表明，烷烃的水化自由能并不符合预计的线性变化趋势。

sentences.en: Slow, careful curing of the concrete improves the hydration of the cement.
sentences.cn: 混凝土的缓慢而精心的养护可以改善水泥的水化作用.

sentences.en: Sugar - laden juices and sodas don't count as proper hydration.
sentences.cn: 不要认为富含糖分的饮料和汽水是恰当的水合物.

sentences.en: The hydration mechanism of matrix materials adulterated admixtures was discussed.
sentences.cn: 探讨了掺入外加剂后基体材料的水化机理.

sentences.en: The team believes one of the most important factors is hydration - the way skin collects and retains moisture.
sentences.cn: 科研人员称，其中最重要的因素是水合，指皮肤吸收水分、保持湿度的过程。

sentences.en: The unstable nature of 16 resulted in hydration.
With this cement, water is necessary for the chemical reaction of hydration.
sentences.cn: 用这种水泥, 加入水在水合化学反应中是必要的.
